content.title: Then I turned and noticed, behind me—a third chair.
content.author: Henrik Karlsson
content.quote_text: Then I turned and noticed, behind me — a third chair.

generation.prompt: J.M.W. Turner style atmospheric luminism with golden light dissolving and emerging from forms, soft focus throughout composition, luminous passages where paint itself seems to glow, forms suggested rather than defined by light, atmospheric perspective creating infinite depth. Capturing the vibe of gratitude, doubt, willingness to persevere. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
